channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alibaba’s chair issues ‘bubble’ warning about U.S. AI investments
item.description: Joe Tsai took aim at the $500 billion attached to OpenAI's Stargate project—and the idea of investors building data centers "on spec."

item.title: Trump And RFK Should Accelerate Inexpensive Treatments For Long Covid And Other Diseases
item.description: Generic drugs can combat an array of chronic diseases, but only if the Trump administration creates a structured, interdisciplinary study of these dru...

item.title: Columbia Pays for Its Sins
item.description: Free academic inquiry is advanced, not stifled, in this case. But the Trump administration should take more care to follow the rules.

item.title: Snow White’s Weekend Box Office Bomb Proves Audiences Want Charming
item.description: The new Snow White bet on a boastful, ultramodern vision of the princess that downplayed her femininity in favor of vanity and hubris.

item.title: United customers took a two-hour flight to nowhere after a pilot forgot their passport and had to turn the China-bound plane back to San Francisco
item.description: United Airlines told Fortune all 257 customers were provided with meal vouchers and compensation.

item.title: Obstructing Trump’s Agenda Via Injunction Is The New Russia Collusion Hoax
item.description: Just as the Russia hoax was weaponized to hamstring the first Trump presidency, the flurry of injunctions is designed to hamstring his second one.

item.title: Canadians, and their dollars, stick to their homes and native land
item.description: Canadians aren't just avoiding American products because of President Trump's tariff threats and talk of annexation.

item.title: Trump administration invokes state secrets act on high-profile deportation case
item.description: The Trump administration has invoked the state secrets privilege to withhold information from a federal judge about deportation flights carrying Venez...

item.title: Michelle Wu vs. Immigration Enforcement
item.description: Progressives such as Wu still can’t give up their near-theological commitment to illegal immigration.

item.title: 'Sanctuary city' raid rounds up over 200 migrant criminals: ICE
item.description: A massive ICE raid in Massachusetts resulted in nearly 400 arrests, including the apprehensions of more than 200 migrants with "serious" criminal conv...

item.title: Another Big Reason Congress Should Make the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act Permanent
item.description: Preserving lower rates and other essential provisions while delaying or forgoing carve-outs would provide certainty for states.

item.title: CT ballot fraud saga leads GOP to alert Bondi after 150 charges lodged, Dem reforms ‘miss the mark,' they say
item.description: Bridgeport officials accused of ballot stuffing and mishandling absentee ballots led Republicans in Connecticut's state capitol to call on Attorney Ge...

item.title: Senate committee to vote on Dr. Oz's nomination to run the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
item.description: The U.S. Senate Committee on Finance will vote later Tuesday on whether to advance Dr. Mehmet Oz's nomination to run Medicare and Medicaid services to...

item.title: Military ballots in spotlight in final unresolved race from 2024 election
item.description: As a legal fight continues in North Carolina's unresolved and contentious state Supreme Court election from last November, the Republican challenger i...

item.title: New Campaign Urges Daily Prayer For Couples Struggling With Infertility
item.description: Though many local churches pray over parishioners longing for children, the EveryLife campaign is a uniquely public display of support.

item.title: New York Times denounces Trump's 'intimidation tactics' against reporters
item.description: The New York Times on Monday denounced "intimidation tactics" by President Trump against its reporters after days in which the administration assailed...

item.title: Simple Economics May Derail the MAHA Reform of Food Stamps
item.description: Smarter policies and healthier citizens are worthy goals. But good intentions alone won’t deliver them.

item.title: Mike Huckabee, Trump's pick to be Israel ambassador, will face senators as war in Gaza restarts
item.description: President Trump's nominee to be ambassador to Israel will face a confirmation hearing Tuesday on Capitol Hill as U.S. and Arab mediators struggle to g...

item.title: Leaked texts show Trump administration’s dislike of Europe, bashing it as ‘pathetic’ and ‘freeloading’
item.description: The U.S. airstrikes against Houthi rebels could ultimately help Europe's access to the Suez Canal—so Trump expects something "in return."

item.title: Justice Department working with DOGE to collect agency referrals to launch fraud cases
item.description: The Department of Justice is working with the Department of Government Efficiency to collect referrals for criminal fraud investigations.

item.title: Exclusive: Instacart bought his self-checkout startup for $350M. Now he’s teaming with a Google DeepMind alum to build low-cost robots
item.description: Startup founder has a new startup building low-cost robots to do the chores, from folding laundry to cleaning toilets.

item.title: DOGE cuts are testing some conservative voters' faith in special election for Matt Gaetz's old seat
item.description: As the Trump administration forges ahead with its dramatic reshaping of the federal government, voters in a northwest Florida congressional district t...

item.title: Utah Passes Historic Bill Installing ‘Western Great Books’ At All State Universities
item.description: Utah's legislature and governor laid groundwork for major higher education improvements that give Florida a run for its money.

item.title: Tesla’s monthly sales slump 40% across Europe, new data shows, but the worst may finally be over
item.description: Tesla's share of Europe's EV market more than halved to just 10% in February, but last month likely marked the worst for the brand as the newer Model ...

item.title: Net Worth Optimization: A New Era of Personalized Risk Optimization
item.description: From mean variance optimization to net worth optimization. We no longer need to ask which is more important, the client’s attitude toward risk or the ...

item.title: So, Who’s Getting Fired for This?
item.description: Accidentally texting war plans to a journalist is clear cause for dismissal.

item.title: Year of Shifting Sands: Reflections on the 2024 Global IPO Market
item.description: The dynamics of global capital flows are shifting. While the overall IPO market contracted last year, a closer look paints a more nuanced picture.

item.title: Book Review: Buffett’s Early Investments
item.description: This book digs into Buffett’s pre-Berkshire investments. The result is a fresh look into the origins of his investment approach.

item.title: The Alternative View: 401(k) Plans Are Better off Without Private Investments
item.description: The debate over the inclusion of private investments in 401(k) plans is a hot topic. Are DC plans better off without them?

item.title: ML Models Need Better Training Data: The GenAI Solution
item.description: As complex ML models become more prevalent in investment management, their tendency to overfit to specific historical conditions poses a growing risk ...
